attributes.additional_details: I don’t think it is fair that MPs  can claim for all their cost. While every other person has to make sacrifice about where they shop or if they put the heating on.
attributes.background: I want the government to make MPs have to pay there own way as every other person does in the country

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about MPs pay and expenses are a matter for the Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA), not the UK Government or Parliament. IPSA is an independent body, meaning that the Government and Parliament has no authority over its decisions.
